snippet.title: UNCHARTED 2 - E3 Trailer
snippet.description:
Fortune hunter Nathan Drake returns in UNCHARTED 2: Among Thieves™, a pulse-pounding third-person action-adventure/shooter created by award-winning developer Naughty Dog.  Down on his luck, Drake is lured back into the treacherous world of thieves and mercenary treasure-seekers he had sought to leave behind.  When a mysterious artifact propels Drake on an expedition to find the legendary Himalayan valley of Shambhala, he finds himself embroiled in a dangerous game of cat-and-mouse against a fugitive war criminal whos after more than just the fabled riches of the lost city.  Caught in a web of deception and plunged into an increasingly deadly pursuit that tests the limits of his endurance, Drake will be forced to risk everything  but has his luck finally run out?
Download the E3 Trailer today!


UNCHARTED 2: Among Thieves is a trademark of Sony Computer Entertainment America Inc.  Created and developed by Naughty Dog, Inc.  (c) 2009 Sony Computer Entertainment America Inc.
Use of this item is subject to the PlayStation(R)Network Terms of Service, this item's use restrictions, and other terms of conditions located at http://www.us.playstation.com/support/useragreements.  If you do not wish to accept all these terms, do not use this item.
Video output in HD requires cables and an HD compatible display, both sold separately.  This video will play on displays ranging from standard definition to 1080p.  However, this video will output at a maximum of 1080p.
